model-path.description: The file path of model config

model-value-defaults.description: Sets default value of model data

key-name.description: The primary key of model data

search-action-config.description: Search form button config, see BalmUI <ui-button> props [docs](https://material.balmjs.com/general/button)

thead.description: Table header renderer, see BalmUI <ui-table> props [docs](https://material.balmjs.com/data-display/table)

tbody.description: Table content renderer, see BalmUI <ui-table> props [docs](https://material.balmjs.com/data-display/table)

row-action-config.description: Table cell button config, see BalmUI <ui-button> props [docs](https://material.balmjs.com/general/button)

row-action-rendering.description: Table cell button rendering handler by server-side

top-action-config.description: Table top bar button config, see BalmUI <ui-button> props [docs](https://material.balmjs.com/general/button)

top-action-rendering.description: Table top bar button rendering handler by server-side

top-action-icon-format.description: Defines the table top bar button format for the button icons, see BalmUI icons [docs](https://material.balmjs.com/icons)

table-data-format.description: Defines the table data format for API

placeholder.description: The placeholder before searching model data

search-on-reset.description: The page will auto search data after resetting model data

force-refresh-data.description: Forced refresh data in keep alive
